title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 323.3 - Effective dates and notice for the Formulary
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 323.3 - Effective dates and notice for the Formulary

State Regulations

For purposes of section
441.3
(f) of

Title 12 NYCRR, the insurance carrier, self-insured employer or third-party
administrator shall identify all claimants with current prescriptions for

Non-Formulary drugs and provide written notification in the format prescribed
by the Chair to the claimant and to the prescribing medical provider after the
effective date of this regulation and on or before May 1, 2021. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
323.3

Adopted

New

York State Register July 21, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 29, eff. 7/21/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
